guidanceItem.title: IUSR_MACHINE account is disabled if it is not used by the application.
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that the default anonymous Internet user account, IUSR_MACHINE is disabled if not used.

How to Check

This is created during IIS installation. MACHINE is the NetBIOS name of your server at IIS installation time.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
